get.summary: Get the Business with the given Id

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The Client's Id

404.description: There was no Business with the given Id

delete.summary: Deletes the Business with the given Id

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The Id of the Business to be deleted

400.description: There was no Business with the given Id

200.description: Business was found, and thus deleted

get.summary: Gets a number of Business, with optional filters
get.description: Does not return Not Found, but an Array of size 0 instead

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Filters results to only Users whose username contains this string

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offsets the result by a given amount

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of results

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Orders the result by a given field. Does not order if the field does not exist

400.description: The Client's (PhoneNumber || CPF || Email) does not exist

patch.summary: Updates the Business with the given Id

400.description: There was no Business with the given Id

get.summary: Get a Client with the given Id

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The Client's Id

404.description: There was no Client with the given Id

delete.summary: Deletes the Client with the given Id

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The Id of the Client to be deleted

204.description: Client was found, and thus deleted

400.description: There was no Client with the given Id

get.summary: Gets a number of Clients, with optional filters
get.description: Does not return Not Found, but an Array of size 0 instead

parameters.name: fullname
parameters.description: Filter the Clients whose fullname contain the given string

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offsets the result by a given amount

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the result by a given amount

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Orders the result by Client, Price or DateTime. Add suffix 'desc' to order descending

400.description: The Client's (PhoneNumber || CPF || Email) does not exist

patch.summary: Updates the Client with the given Id

400.description: There was no Client with the given Id

get.summary: Get the Contact with the given Id

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The Contact's Id

200.description: The AppointmentContact with the given Id

404.description: There was no Appointment Contact with the given Id

delete.summary: Deletes the Appointment Contact with the given Id

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The Id of the AptContact to be deleted

400.description: There was no Contact with the given Id

get.summary: Gets a number of Appointment Contacts, with optional filters
get.description: Does not return Not Found, but an Array of size 0 instead

parameters.name: ClientId
parameters.description: Filter by a specific Client

parameters.name: minDateTime
parameters.description: The nearest Contact set up

parameters.name: maxDateTime
parameters.description: The furthest Contact set up

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Orders the result by Client, or DateTime. Add suffix 'desc' to order descending

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offsets the result by a given amount

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the result by a given amount

400.description: The given (ClientId || LogId) does not exist

put.summary: Update the Appointment Contact with the given Id

400.description: There was no AptContact with the given Id

get.summary: Get the Log with the given Id

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The Log's Id

404.description: There was no Appointment Log with the given Id

delete.summary: Deletes the Appointment Log with the given Id

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The Id of the AptLog to be deleted

400.description: There was no Log with the given Id

get.summary: Gets a number of Appointment Logs, with optional filters
get.description: Does not return Not Found, but an Array of size 0 instead

parameters.name: ClientId
parameters.description: Filter by a specific Client

parameters.name: minPrice
parameters.description: Minimum Price of the Appointments

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: Maximum Price of the Appointments

parameters.name: minDateTime
parameters.description: The oldest DateTime the Appointment took place

parameters.name: maxDateTime
parameters.description: The most recent DateTime the Appointment took placet

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Orders the result by Client, Price or DateTime. Add suffix 'desc' to order descending

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offsets the result by a given amount

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the result by a given amount

400.description: The given (ClientId || ScheduleId) does not exist

put.summary: Update the Appointment Log with the given Id

400.description: There was no AptLog with the given Id

post.summary: Get a Token when Logging in, with either UserName or Email, and Password

patch.summary: Change password of the User with the given Email

500.description: Logout unsucessfull. Probable Internal Server Error

parameters.description: The furthest Contact set up

parameters.name: sort

clientId.description: The Id of the Client to Contact

businessId.description: The Id of the Business who owns this Contact

aptLogId.description: The Id of the Log that precedes this Contact

dateTime.description:
The Date to Contact the Client
The Time is used because, chances are, there is a better Time of the day to contact the Client

clientId.description: The Id of the Client who took the Appointment

businessId.description: The Id of the Business who owns this Contact

scheduleId.description: The Id of the Schedule that precedes this Log, if any

dateTime.description: The DateTime when the Log was registered

observation.description: Special information about the Appointment, if applicable

clientId.description: The Id of the Client who made the Schedule

businessId.description: The Id of the Business who owns this Contact

contactId.description: The Id of the Contact that precedes this Schedule, if any

dateTime.description: The scheduled DateTime of the Appointment

phoneNumber.description: Phone Number. Must contain only numbers, and may be preceded by a '+'

cpf.description: CPF. Must be only precisely 11 numbers

phoneNumber.description: Phone Number. Must contain only numbers and/or a '+'

newPassword.description:
New Password. Only used when registering the user or changing the password
For Logging in, use FlowLoginRequest instead

cpf.description: CPF. Must be only precisely 11 numbers

additionalNote.description: Special information about the Client, if applicable

cpf.description: CPF. Must be only precisely 11 numbers

additionalNote.description: Special information about the Client, if applicable

phoneNumber.description: Phone Number. Must contain only numbers and/or a '+'

newPassword.description:
New Password. Only used when registering the user or changing the password
For Logging in, use FlowLoginRequest instead
